The market has been consistently rising, and we’ve enjoyed that rally.

However, we’re now seeing some profit-taking, which is a normal and healthy part of the market cycle. 
It’s important to embrace this phase, stay calm, and avoid making any hasty decisions.

Stocks are not going to be Zero!

This is the cycle where market kick out the gamblers and test the patience of investors.

Don't take any decision in panic.

The Bullrun started from 1st April 2023 is officially over now

New league will begin from next week
